page.title: 04OUR CHURCH CHRIST CHURCH
page.content: Our church is a very old church,it was built in 1858. The {LOCAL HISTORY} of the church is recorded in the register of deaths,births and marriages. This register is very old. The {LANDSCAPE} of the church is very beautiful and the building itself is a very unusual shape, the perimeter is 62m.50cm. we measured it.The alter cloth was made by the ladies of the village and they are different for each season. The church's{POPULATION}comes from Enham and Smannell. The {RELIGION}taught in the school is C.ofE. People come every Sunday to take part in the services. Mr.Millward is our Rector, he also conducts the services at St.Georges in Enham.The services held are Early communion,Family Communion and Even Song.When it is summer we walk to the church for our school's services.They have just rebuilt the porch and gate.
